fr.sii.ogham.core.message.fluent

Class SingleContentBuilder<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.message.fluent.SingleContentBuilder<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type of the parent for fluent chaining

    public class SingleContentBuilder<P>
extends Object
    Fluent API to build a single content based on:
    • Either a string
    • Or a template string
    • Or a template loaded from a path
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

      Initializes with the parent to go back to.

    • Method Detail

      • string

        public P string(String content)
        Set the content directly as a simple string.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If any other method of this class was called before calling this method, only the value of this method is used.

        Parameters:
        content - the content as a string
        Returns:
        the instance for fluent chaining

      • templateString

        public P templateString(String template,
                        Object bean)
        Set the content using a template (directly provided as a string). The template contains variables that are evaluated against the bean object.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If any other method of this class was called before calling this method, only the value of this method is used.

        Parameters:
        template - the template directly provided as a string
        bean - the object that contains the variables that are referenced in the template
        Returns:
        the instance for fluent chaining

      • templateString

        public P templateString(String template,
                        Context context)
        Set the content using a template (directly provided as a string). The template contains variables that are evaluated against the evaluation context. The context contains at least the values of the variables but can also contain additional information for parsing the template.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If any other method of this class was called before calling this method, only the value of this method is used.

        Parameters:
        template - the template directly provided as a string
        context - contains at least the variables that are referenced in the template and may contain additional information to parse the template
        Returns:
        the instance for fluent chaining

      • template

        public P template(String templatePath,
                  Object bean)
        Set the content using a template loaded from a path. The template contains variables that are evaluated against the bean object.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If any other method of this class was called before calling this method, only the value of this method is used.

        Parameters:
        templatePath - the path to the template
        bean - the object that contains the variables that are referenced in the template
        Returns:
        the instance for fluent chaining

      • template

        public P template(String templatePath,
                  Context context)
        Set the content using a template loaded from a path. The template contains variables that are evaluated against the evaluation context. The context contains at least the values of the variables but can also contain additional information for parsing the template.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If any other method of this class was called before calling this method, only the value of this method is used.

        Parameters:
        templatePath - the path to the template
        context - contains at least the variables that are referenced in the template and may contain additional information to parse the template
        Returns:
        the instance for fluent chaining

      • template

        public P template(ResourcePath templatePath,
                  Context context)
        Set the content using a template loaded from a path. The template contains variables that are evaluated against the evaluation context. The context contains at least the values of the variables but can also contain additional information for parsing the template.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If any other method of this class was called before calling this method, only the value of this method is used.

        Parameters:
        templatePath - the path to the template
        context - contains at least the variables that are referenced in the template and may contain additional information to parse the template
        Returns:
        the instance for fluent chaining

      • build

        public Content build()
        Build the final Content. Only the last registered content is used (the last call to any method of this class)
        Returns:
        the built content
